title: Take the quiz: Which shortlisted Polaris Music Prize album should you listen to? | CBC Music
text:
The winner of the 2019 Polaris Music Prize will be decided on Monday, Sept. 16, so there's no better time to brush up on the 10 shortlisted albums.

The quiz below will help you get started.

After answering a series of unscientific questions, you'll be presented with the shortlisted album most likely to suit your tastes. After listening to it, we highly recommend listening to the rest of the shortlisted albums, which were chosen by a jury of Canadian music experts and journalists.

The albums shortlisted for the 2019 Polaris Music Prize are:

Dominique Fils-Aimé, Stay Tuned!

Elisapie, The Ballad of the Runaway Girl

Fet.Nat, Le Mal

Haviah Mighty, 13th Floor

Jessie Reyez, Being Human in Public

Les Louanges, La Nuit est une panthère

Marie Davidson, Working Class Woman

Pup, Morbid Stuff

Shad, A Short Story About a War

Snotty Nose Rez Kids, Trapline
description: Answer a series of questions to find out which of the 10 shortlisted Polaris Music Prize albums is for you.
